modName: Skyrim 50 HD NEW Main Menu Collection
summary:
A great HD Skyrim main menu replacement mod to replace the boring black screen.
50 different HD main menu wallpapers replaces original. Hope you like them... only 50 now but i have few more. Depends if anyone like these.
descriptionHtml:
******************************
Main Menu Collection

Version: 1.1

******************************
Author: Wolfpac

**********************
Description
**********************
A great HD Skyrim main menu replacement mod to replace the boring black screen.
50 different HD main menu wallpapers replaces original. Hope you like them... only 50 now but i have few more. Depends if anyone like these.

Adds :

* A 50 new background designed for HD 1920 X 1080 res

Themes:

13th Warrior
300 SPARTANS
ALDUIN
ALDUINS WALL
BEAUTIFUL ARCHER
BEAUTIFUL SUNRISE
UNDERWORLD
UNDERWORLD RISE OF LYCANS
DAWNGUARD
DAWNGUARD GARGOYLE
DEATH DEALER
DEMONS Luis Royo TRIBUTE
RIVER FAIRY Luis Royo TRIBUTE
BLADES LEGACY
DOOM GATE
CONAN
CASTLEVANIA
ELSWEYR
GAME Of THRONES
BEOWULF
LAST LEGION
HEART KNIGHT
MERIDIA
PLAGUE IN A CITY
WRATH OF THE LICH KING
SOVNGARDE
SOUL CAIRN
ICE AGE
WITCHER 2 TRISS MERIGOLD
WITCHER 2
VAN HELSING
LOTR
PAARTHURNAX
SKYRIM DRAGONS... and many more SKYRIM new main menus !

(screenshots in archive)

Note: I mainly made this mod for me but thought others might like it.

Comments and suggestions are welcome.

**********************
Installation
**********************

Use Nexus Mod Manager or install manually by extracting into your /skyrim/Data/ folder.

Simple extract the .rar folder and select which folder you liked based on the images. Then, open that folder and copy its contents to the Skyrim folder.


**********************
Uninstallation
**********************

Use Nexus Mod Manager or remove the following from your /skyrim/data/ folder

/skyrim/Data/meshes/Interface/logo/LOGO.nif
/skyrim/Data/textures/interface/objects/mainmenuwallpaper.dds
author: Wolfpac
